analysis.description:

	-transfer (/unique_chucks/25/0xfc07251450048bf4e9fa60b856c1e0abd1574d1c.sol#296-322)

	- battle.isOnBattle(obj.monsterId) || trade.isOnTrading(obj.monsterId) (/unique_chucks/25/0xfc07251450048bf4e9fa60b856c1e0abd1574d1c.sol#288-290)
